extendedInfo.description: deci is a new and innovative way to make decisions with friends. As one of the only social decision-making apps out there, deci will change the way you use your smart phone and the way you make decisions. deci 1.0 is for you and your Facebook friends to decide together what to do and where to go. Coordinating hangouts with friends can be difficult and, letâs be honest, annoying but with deci scheduling activities can be fun and convenient. deci is an ideal way to decide on: - dinner out with friends- lunch with co-workers - coffee with your girlfriends  - Happy Hour with buddies- a hike with your family - or any custom decision you create The possibilities are endless, deci is revolutionizing decision-making. deci Features: -	Group Decision Making: no longer hold the burden of making group decisions alone-	Chat: interact with other users who are in the same deci-	Graphical Voting Interface: transparently and dynamically shows voting behaviors of friends-	Facebook Integration: Facebook friends are pre-loaded for convenience-	Notifications: Deeply thought out push notifications to signal crucial deci moments -	âCustomâ deci*: have friends weigh in on tough decisions*deci Version 1.0 has a âcustomâ tab on the Where screen that allows a user to create their own deci with custom choices, rather than just locations. Keywords: decision, decide, social decision, choose, group decision, vote, dessy, desy, desi, invite, hang out

reviews.title: Great start, but missing features!
reviews.comment: I really like the way this app does events you can vote on them and it works very well. However, it has no tracking for ongoing or recurring events . For example I run a weekly Dungeons and Dragons night but because of scheduling, peoples attendance always changes it would be helpful if we could set up a recurring event and go on the time as well not just on one event.
reviews.author: Nathaniel Peat

reviews.title: Perfect for happy hour
reviews.comment: I most often use deci for happy hour. It\'s more fun to decide together and doesn\'t seem inconvenient.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app with high polish
reviews.comment: Really great idea,  well done!   Features I\'d love to see: - integration with phone contacts - what if we know where but need to agree a day?  - not just location voting but choice to create anything,  like an online poll.   Great app,  keep up the good work! Thank you.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Has Potential
reviews.comment: I like the idea of this app, but it\'s useless until my friends start downloading it. Even though they get a notification on Facebook that I invited them to an event, they can\'t view it or respond to it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really fun way to connect
reviews.comment: And get people together
reviews.author: Max P

reviews.title: Nice : )
reviews.comment: i think I\'ll use this spp waaaaay more then facebook event planning! i think its even more exciting that my old teacher and principal made this app! good job guys.
reviews.author: Erica Jackson

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: This is cool! Hooks up to Facebook friends and I can vote with my buddies where we\'re going to get together.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent App!
reviews.comment: This app is really awesome and fun to use. I love the gameboard screen and how it lets you \"visualize\" your choices and how you can see who voted for what choice. It definitely has made coordinating plans with my friends MUCH easier! I also like it has the \"custom\" option, because I often like to use this app to take polls among my friends.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t figure out some things
reviews.comment: First if it\'s possible, I can\'t figure out how to add people after making the event. Also there doesn\'t seem to be a way for the creator to delete previously made events. Lastly the feedback button keeps timing out telling me to check my Internet connection (which is fine) so I can\'t even see if anyone else has addressed my issues. Overall looks promising but could use some more options.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: This is so helpful when getting together with friends. I love the voting feature!!

reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Friendsource your decisions
reviews.comment: Deci is a new way to decide on just about doing anything. Let\'s say you\'re planning a night out with friends, but can\'t decide on where to go. With Deci, you\'ll create the event by setting a date, add friends by pulling them from your Facebook contacts, and finally add up to four places from your immediate area. Once these have been added, your added friends can vote on which venue to attend. You can send messages back and forth to debate, but the main section of Deci makes it easy to see the choices and who has already voted. It\'s an intriguing idea, and only time will bear out whether it gets adopted at large, but it\'s executed simply enough for everyone to easily understand how to use it. Download Deci today, and decide whether or not it\'s for you. -- via Best Apps Market
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Decisions made easy, finally!
reviews.comment: This app helps me round up my best people so we can get 10 kinds of crazy at our favorite places with the touch of a screen!
